potion.name: Healing Elixir
potion.description: A small bottle, with what looks like healing juice.

superpotion.name: Super Healing Elixir
superpotion.description: A larger, deeper bottle, with a more *insert word here* healing power.

godpotion.name: God Elixir
godpotion.description: A tiny bottle, with what looks like an empowered version of a super elixir. (Increases Max HP)

rawmeat.name: Raw Meat
rawmeat.description: Gross, tangy, raw meat. Not a good choice. Better than burnt meat, though.

cookedmeat.name: Cooked Meat
cookedmeat.description: A good piece of meat. Cooked right through. Looks delicious.

burntmeat.name: Burnt Meat
burntmeat.description: Awh no! Burnt meat. The worst of its counterparts. Tastes like charcoal, sells for nothing.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: A more medium sized, but still basic dagger.

broadsword.name: Broad Sword
broadsword.description: A large sword, with a medium hilt. Deals moderate damage.

shortsword.name: Short Sword
shortsword.description:
The most basic of short swords, dealing small amounts of damage.
 Good selling price.

longsword.name: Long Sword
longsword.description:
The longer version of it's brother, yet with less damage and selling price. Not recommended for novice users.
 Leaves quite a mark.

spear.name: Spear
spear.description: A basic spear. Long stick, short dagger. Average selling price.

katana.name: Katana
katana.description: An assassin-like weapon. Looks hard to use.

woodshield.name: Wooden Shield
woodshield.description: A beat up wooden shield. Not well put together. Watch out for splinters!

rusthelmet.name: Rusty Helmet
rusthelmet.description: An old rusty helmet. Will have to do.

leatherchest.name: Leather Chestplate
leatherchest.description: A squishy piece of leather armor. Not much use. Better than just your chest, though.

leatherpants.name: Leather Leggings
leatherpants.description: A set of leggings, made entirely of leather. Has some holes, but is better than just pants.

leatherboots.name: Leather Boots
leatherboots.description:
A small pair of boots you can barely fit in. Better than walking around barefoot, though.
 Could catch a disease!

leathergloves.name: Leather Gloves
leathergloves.description: They only seem to cover your palm and back of hand. Fingerless gloves, you could say.

leatherbrace.name: Leather Braces
leatherbrace.description: These badboys seem to cover from below your elbow to your palms. Still fingerless, but more protection.
